founderCard.name: Saulo Candeira
founderCard.description: I have a background in management, technology, and languages, and I am dedicated to software and electronics development. I aim to integrate software, 3D printing, and electronics to create technological innovations. I work as a programmer, and in my spare time, I mainly develop integrations of programmable boards with electric motors for CNC machines, scooters, bicycles, and drones.

software.webDevelopmentDesc: Create responsive and modern websites using the latest technologies.
software.mobileDevelopmentDesc: Mobile apps for Android and iOS with native performance and great user experience.
software.cloudDesc: Cloud services for storage, processing, and scalability of applications.
software.iotDesc: Integration and development of solutions for the Internet of Things.

electronics.vehicleMaintenanceDesc: Maintenance services for all types of electric vehicles.
electronics.lithiumBatteryRecoveryDesc: Recovery and reconditioning of lithium batteries to extend their lifespan.

prototyping.drawing3dDesc: Create detailed 3D models for a variety of applications.
prototyping.3dPrintingDesc: Turn your digital designs into physical objects with our high-quality 3D printers.

business.businessPlanDesc: Create business models for companies looking to enter the digital era.
business.agileMethodologyDesc: Implement agile methodologies to improve business and company efficiency.
business.managementSystemDesc: Project management system to maximize business or project efficiency.
